com.gmail.vangnamngo.scriptlangtest.corrections

Class Corrector

  • public class Corrector
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Corrector() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void repairScriptContext(ScriptContext context)
      Attempts to repair a ScriptContext by performing the following actions: delete any variables with a null name; if the parent is null AND the current ScriptContext object is not the Main.GLOBAL_SCRIPT_CONTEXT, set the parent to Main.GLOBAL_SCRIPT_CONTEXT. This method will not attempt to additionally fix the parents of this ScriptContext.
      static boolean verifyScriptContext(ScriptContext context)
      Determines if a ScriptContext object is valid.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Corrector

        public Corrector()

    • Method Detail

      • verifyScriptContext

        public static boolean verifyScriptContext(ScriptContext context)
        Determines if a ScriptContext object is valid. The terms of validity are:
        • no variable name is set to null;
        • no variable value is set to null;
        • there is no circular parenting;
        • the final parent context is Main.GLOBAL_SCRIPT_CONTEXT.
        Parameters:
        context - The ScriptContext to verify.
        Returns:
        True if the ScriptContext object is valid, false otherwise.

      • repairScriptContext

        public static void repairScriptContext(ScriptContext context)
        Attempts to repair a ScriptContext by performing the following actions:
        • delete any variables with a null name;
        • if the parent is null AND the current ScriptContext object is not the Main.GLOBAL_SCRIPT_CONTEXT, set the parent to Main.GLOBAL_SCRIPT_CONTEXT.
        This method will not attempt to additionally fix the parents of this ScriptContext.
